Package ohos.multimodalinput.event

Class MmiPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.multimodalinput.event.MmiPoint

  • public class MmiPoint
extends Object
    Represents the x, y, or z coordinate in a given coordinate system.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.MultimodalInput#MULTIMODAL_INPUT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MmiPoint​(float px, float py)
      A constructor used to create an MmiPoint object with the x and y coordinates specified.
      MmiPoint​(float px, float py, float pz)
      A constructor used to create an MmiPoint object with the x, y, and z coordinates specified.

    • Method Summary

      Obtains the y coordinate.

      Obtains the z coordinate.

      • toString

        public String toString​()
        Obtains a string representation of this MmiPoint object with the x, y, and z coordinates specified.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        Returns a string representation of this MmiPoint object with the x, y, and z coordinates specified, in the format of MmiPoint{px=x coordinate value, py=y coordinate value, pz=z coordinate value}.
        Since:
        3
